Articles.Content: For some reason when I undock the docking magnet stays on and doesn't go off even if I move well over a kilometer away!! I thought it was the tweakable everything mod but it hasn't fixed it. The log shows nothing interesting at all.
Please? any idea how to fix this???

Your original post has no info whatsoever.

Start off from updating all your mods to their current versions.

Recently I had a somewhat similar issue with Kerbal Joint Reinforcement. The problem's been gone after I updated it.
Docking ports seem to get stuck occasionally - I've found this helpful http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/78863.
